thread.section_title: Med Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Med Mart | www.medmartonline.com
thread.title: Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text: I am seventy six years old and taking care of my handicapped husband. He is still able to go to the bathroom but unable to get off the toilet. I am so grateful for the lift seat. It will certainly save my back! Greatest invention since corn flakes! I have already showed it to numerous individuals. My husband's therapist didn't know there was such a thing. My neighbor that installed it showed it to his daughter that works with handicapped individuals, she is going to recommend they get one to save her back.
